source.name: Business Improvement Districts (BID) Organization List
source.description: Small Business Services (SBS) oversees and supports New York City's network of 64 Business Improvement Districts (BIDS) - the most comprehensive system of its kind in the country. BIDs are locally based organizations that keep their commercial districts clean and safe, market those districts to consumers, visitors and new businesses, and invest in capital improvements to open opportunities for other economic development initiatives to succeed.
